goal: Expand the Learning Hub to cater to ALL 3700+ LeetCode problems in the database by organizing them under the 5-level intuitive pattern structure, while maintaining curated starter problems for a smooth entry.
notes: Consolidated Guide functionality into Learning Hub
Renamed Learning to Learning Hub in navigation
Updated patterns.json with analogies and deep-dive intuition for 18 core categories
Mapped ALL 3700+ database problems to these 18 categories via automated tagging in app.js
Updated LearningManager to render 5 progressive levels of patterns
Enabled deep-dive modals that show intuition, templates, curated starters, and all associated database problems
Verified exhaustive coverage of the database through the Learning Hub
Fixed SyntaxError in app.js caused by redundant code insertion
